page.title: 19SCHOOLS
page.content: School to my mind is the most important part of your life.It is like building foundations for a house,build bad foundations and the house will sink.I don't want to find myself in a dole queue,so I try my best at my school work. School can be a pain. You can get judged unfairly by teachers who won't listen to you and then you get punished for something you didn't do. Teachers tend to overload the work and expect too much of you.You end up doing too much work badly when you could have done a small amount well. More facilities in schools are needed desperately.In this area mixed schools seem to be favoured compared to single sex schools.Our school for example has very few P.E.facilities whilst most of the other secondary schools have superb sports centres.
